description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Prisoners of War and Military Prisons. Personal narratives ... With a general account of Prison Life and Prisons in the South during the War of the Rebellion, ... by A. B. Isham ... H. M. Davidson ... and H. B. Furness. [Illustrated.]" Author: ISHAM, Asa Brainerd. Contributor: DAVIDSON, Henry M. - Sergeant in the Federal Army Contributor: FURNESS, Henry B. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9605.d.6." Page: 379 Place of Publishing: Cincinnati Date of Publishing: 1890 Publisher: Lyman & Cushing Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001823010 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
